content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of a BurnerMiningDrill at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0), a Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0), and a Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)

### Iron Ore Mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of a BurnerMiningDrill at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a Chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Electricity Generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of a SteamEngine at position(x=10.5, y=10.5), a Boiler at position(x=-6.0, y=24.5), and an OffshorePump at position(x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Pipe Group at position(x=10.5, y=13.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to the SteamEngine and the Boiler

### Electricity Distribution at id=22015
Consists of multiple small-electric-poles at positions(x=8.5,y=9.5), (x=2.5,y=2.5), (x=4.5,y=5.5), and (x=2.5,y=1.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full before continuing mining
- Make sure the fuel source is not full to avoid warnings

### Errors when using furnaces
- Ensure there are ingredients to smelt to avoid the "no ingredients to smelt" warning

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure the boiler has fuel to avoid the "out of fuel" warning

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure there is input liquid and fluid present in connections to avoid warnings

### Errors when using chests
- Ensure the chest is not full to avoid the "chest is full" warning

### Errors when using burner inserters
- Ensure the chest is not full to avoid the "chest is full" warning
- Make sure the source items are available to avoid the "waiting for source items" status
